p: The advantages of using simulated cases for the CCHH ECHO are numerous. The cases: (1) can be adjusted for different types and levels of health professionals, (2) can be modified to educate health professionals regarding how to approach patients with varying levels of climate change knowledge and belief, (3) can be shifted to benefit the specific geographic region and culture of the population affected, and (4) the cases can be recorded and used for future training sessions. 29
